title: City Services | Garland, TX
text: The City of Garland provides its residents and businesses with a wide variety of high-quality services. Whether helping a citizen adopt a new pet or coordinating the development process for a new business, City employees take pride in responding quickly and efficiently to the community's needs. This section of our website provides links to some of the most frequently requested City Services. Search "City Services" in the search box on the Cityâ€™s Home Page for all services provided by Garland.
